data.prayer: Father, help 8 new simple churches start among the 40,900 people in the state of Longford, Ireland. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Longford, Ireland
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Longford, Ireland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Longford, Ireland.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord we pray you unite the 636 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Longford.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Longford, Ireland to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 40,264 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Longford, Ireland to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Longford.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Longford, Ireland by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Longford, Ireland has a population of 40,900.

We estimate Longford has 636 people who might know Jesus, 36,749 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,515 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
